sen.j: 勅願寺（ちょくがんじ）とは、時の天皇・太上天皇の発願により、国家鎮護・皇室繁栄などを祈願して創建された祈願所のこと。
sen.e: Chokugan-ji Temples were temples for a prayer founded at the will of the emperors and the retired emperors of the time to pray for the protection of the nation and the prosperity of the Imperial Household.
